No. 152062)} Sub: Policy Guidelines for External Professionals (EPs) in IT-PMU -discontinuation of Work from Home Facility reg: In view of a major transition underway on Datalake Portal from ver. 2.0 to 3.0 and emerging challenges to be addressed on priority and urgency of work and commitment expected from EPs in IT PMU, in partial modification to the Para 3.5.3 (b) of the Policy Circular No_ 1.3.1.37/2024 dated 06-08-2024, the provision of Work from Home stands withdrawn W.e.f. 01-07-2025. 2  This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. oelx Sanjay Kumar Patel) Ilc Chief General Manager (Coord.)
